scenario_text.value:
Whoa! Don’t just grab me out of nowhere like
that! I almost had a heart attack!

But I was so, so worried about you! I’m so
glad I found you again!

Eheheh... Yeah, I’m happy to see you too,
Floramon.

I felt the same when I reunited with you,
Labramon.

(Still, everyone is dead tired, by the looks
of it.)

(Can’t blame them, between being isolated and
that mental attack. That was rough.)

Aoi, Saki, you two rest here. I’m going to go
look for the others.

Sure, I’m totally on board for that...
I’m about to fall down from exhaustion.
Me too, to be honest... Thank you, Takuma.

A fight... Then one of our friends must be
there!
